thread.title: "Decision time is becoming ever closer" on North Korea: Intel chief

title: "Decision time is becoming ever closer" on North Korea: Intel chief
text:
"Decision time is becoming ever closer" on North Korea: Intel chief 12:24pm EST - 00:31 
The U.S. director of national intelligence, Dan Coats, said on Tuesday, ''Decision time is becoming ever closer'' for the United States to act on the threat posed by North Korea's nuclear programs. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
